title: 54: Violence and Virtue
dc:creator: Canon Press
description:
• Why are conservative Christians so worried about sex on the screen but not violence?
  • Are they hypocrites? Or is violence virtuous....
  • The guys discuss violence in some favorite movies (and not so favorite movies). If you've seen John Wick or Nobody, pay attention.
  • They also give some tips for watching violent movies with kids.

Get Andrew of the Firedrake today: https://canonballbooks.com/products/andrew-and-the-firedrake/
